notesStmt.note: The quotation from Voltaire comes from a section of his Philosophical Dictionary entitled "On a Passage in Homer." On the verso of this manuscript Whitman wrote poetic lines, some of which appeared slightly revised in the 1855 edition of Leaves of Grass, in the poem that would eventually be titled "Song of Myself." It seems likely that the lines on recto and verso were written around the same time, dating this manuscript to before or early in 1855.
